description:
With nova 2011.2~gamma2~bzr980-0ubuntu0ppa1~lucid1, if I do 'nova-manage service describe_ressource HOST1' before 'update_ressource' command, I've got error 'Command failed, please check log for more info' and in the log of nova-manage command :

2011-04-12 17:34:54,996 DEBUG nova.rpc [-] Making asynchronous call on scheduler ... from (pid=7568) call /usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/rpc.py:350
2011-04-12 17:34:54,997 DEBUG nova.rpc [-] MSG_ID is a274a289fe9143c5875d78d59759f5af from (pid=7568) call /usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/rpc.py:353
2011-04-12 17:34:55,286 CRITICAL nova [-] IndexError list index out of range
[u'Traceback (most recent call last):\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/rpc.py", line 188, in _receive\n    rval = node_func(context=ctxt, **node_args)\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/scheduler/manager.py", line 112, in show_host_resources\n    compute_node_ref = compute_ref[\'compute_node\'][0]\n', u'IndexError: list index out of range\n']
(nova): TRACE: Traceback (most recent call last):
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/bin/nova-manage", line 1122, in <module>
(nova): TRACE:     main()
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/bin/nova-manage", line 1111, in main
(nova): TRACE:     fn(*argv)
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/bin/nova-manage", line 703, in describe_resource
(nova): TRACE:     "args": {"host": host}})
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/rpc.py", line 385, in call
(nova): TRACE:     raise wait_msg.result
(nova): TRACE: RemoteError: IndexError list index out of range
(nova): TRACE: [u'Traceback (most recent call last):\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/rpc.py", line 188, in _receive\n    rval = node_func(context=ctxt, **node_args)\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/scheduler/manager.py", line 112, in show_host_resources\n    compute_node_ref = compute_ref[\'compute_node\'][0]\n', u'IndexError: list index out of range\n']
(nova): TRACE:
title: Nova-manage describe_resource list index out of range

comments.content:
With nova 2011.2~gamma2~bzr980-0ubuntu0ppa1~lucid1, if I do 'nova-manage service describe_ressource HOST1' before 'update_ressource' command, I've got error 'Command failed, please check log for more info' and in the log of nova-manage command :

2011-04-12 17:34:54,996 DEBUG nova.rpc [-] Making asynchronous call on scheduler ... from (pid=7568) call /usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/rpc.py:350
2011-04-12 17:34:54,997 DEBUG nova.rpc [-] MSG_ID is a274a289fe9143c5875d78d59759f5af from (pid=7568) call /usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/rpc.py:353
2011-04-12 17:34:55,286 CRITICAL nova [-] IndexError list index out of range
[u'Traceback (most recent call last):\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/rpc.py", line 188, in _receive\n    rval = node_func(context=ctxt, **node_args)\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/scheduler/manager.py", line 112, in show_host_resources\n    compute_node_ref = compute_ref[\'compute_node\'][0]\n', u'IndexError: list index out of range\n']
(nova): TRACE: Traceback (most recent call last):
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/bin/nova-manage", line 1122, in <module>

(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/bin/nova-manage", line 1111, in main

(nova): TRACE: [u'Traceback (most recent call last):\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/rpc.py", line 188, in _receive\n    rval = node_func(context=ctxt, **node_args)\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/scheduler/manager.py", line 112, in show_host_resources\n    compute_node_ref = compute_ref[\'compute_node\'][0]\n', u'IndexError: list index out of range\n']
(nova): TRACE:
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ethuleau

comments.content: This bug report is no longer representative of what currently happens. Running the specified command will result in the same 'Command failed, please check log for more info' output, but the log will have an exception.ComputeHostNotFound, not an IndexError. What is the expected behavior?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon

comments.content: I think that's acceptable behavior, please reopen if you disagree.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
